title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Arrived with the classic exploded capacitor causing short on PPBUS_G3H. Replaced cap which restored PPBUS_G3H but still no power.

PM_SLP_S4_L 0V

PCH_SUSACK_L 3.3V

PM_SYSRST_L 0.52V

PM_BATLOW_L 3.3V

SMC_ADAPTER_EN 3.3V

PM_RSMRST_L 3.3V

ALL_SYS_PWGD 0V

What next?

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L (at same time).

title: 820-00165 no power
message: yes drops from 3.3v to 0.358v when  SMC_ONOFF_L   is triggered

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Then check for pulse at PM_SLP_S4/3_L at same time.
Also try to start in SMC bypass mode.

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
yes there is a pulse at  PM_SLP_S4/3_L 

no start at SMC bypass mode

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Then check for pulse at all big coils.
Also check ALL_SYS_PWRGD (for pulse).

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
If you tap the the bottom side of the board in CPU section at times the fan will spin and boot properly according to bench power supply  but only for a few seconds to a couple minutes then turns off again.

Does this sound like a internal problem with the new behavior?

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Test the board alone on the desk; do not connect LIO flex.
Also try with original Magsafe 2 charger.

title: 820-00165 no power
message: I already have the board alone on the desk now with no LIO flex

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Check for corrosion at Q8150 and U1950.
And do the mentioned tests...

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
During testing noticed L7560 voltage was fluctuating. A couple times the fan even spun during the test. Replaced Q7560 but no change. Should U7501 be replaced?

Yes there is a pulse at ALL_SYS_PWRGD

title: 820-00165 no power
message: Replaced Q7520 and U7501 but no change

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Check for pulse at pins 7 & 3 of U1950.
Inspect all SPI Bus Termination resistors and their traces.
PLT_RESET_L pulses too?
Any pulse detected at CPU coils?

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
yes pins 7&3 pulse. While testing pin 3 the fan started spinning and stayed spinning until unplugged. After unplugged and test again no fan spin.

termination resistors are traces are fine

PLT_RESET_L pulses

no pulse at CPU coils

title: 820-00165 no power
message:
Pin 3/U1950 and PLT_RESET_L cannot pulse, if no pulse at VCORE too; which is not easy to detect.

3V3_S5 and C7540 voltages are steady high when trigger SMC_ONOFF_L?
Check for voltage pulse, or short, at pages 57 & 58.
